level.heading: Restrictions on dividends.
level.text: A domestic title insurer shall only declare or distribute a dividend to shareholders without the prior written approval of the Commissioner as would be permitted under ยง 31-706, for insurers other than life insurers.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2151 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-223, see notes following ยง 31-5031.01.
